title: Ticket #7238: Condor should support a CVMFS URL
description:
Condor should support a CVMFS URL and LVC jobs should specify it, so Condor can at least use the CVMFS API and bypass FUSE when fetching files from CVMFS.

Miron (?) thinks this is a good idea to improve CVMFS robustness (?).
remarks:

The sibling issue on the LIGO side is here: https://github.com/lscsoft/osg-lvc/issues/67

Demoting to priority 4 b/c it may be really tricky and the GW file xfer plugin is more important.
